tar -cvf archive.tar /folderarchive.tarCreate a compressed archive of a folder.Created archive.tar of the folder contents.lsarchive.tarCheck the contents of the directory after creating the archive.tar -xvf archive.tarfolder/file1.txt
folder/file2.txtExtract the contents of the archive.Verify the extraction of the files.exitexitEnd the session and close the terminal.
